VelaTwins.Experiments package

Submodules

VelaTwins.Experiments.experiments module

class VelaTwins.Experiments.experiments.Experiment

Bases: object

This module looks at the performance of the model for varying lengths of description sentences, and logs performance vs. description length. Please note that this module has never been run to completion.

Example use: num_words, score = Experiment.run()
